emuInput.TitMainTitle: Copy of newspaper clipping of Mr. Morris Fountain and Mrs. Miriam Sharpe Fountain, with "Married in Chicago" headline above couple
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of copied image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 11, 1941, pg. 8, reads, "Married in Chicago - Mr. and Mrs. Morris Fountain, the former Miss Miriam Sharpe, were married by Rev. J. C. Austin, in Chicago last Friday. - Gushimere photo."
